General.Name: abrdn European Logistics Income PLC
General.Description: abrdn European Logistics Income plc invests in logistic real estate properties in Europe. Its property portfolio includes mid-box and urban logistics warehouses. The company was formerly known as Aberdeen Standard European Logistics Income PLC and changed its name to abrdn European Logistics Income plc in January 2022. abrdn European Logistics Income plc was incorporated in 2017 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
